raw: F l o r a   I l g e r  Personal Information  Gender Female Age 45 Nationality German Location Munich, Germany  Education  Ph.D. in Computer Science Technical University of Munich, Germany  Certifications   Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP)  Certified Information Security Manager (CISM)  Certified Information Systems Auditor (CISA)  ISO 27001 Lead Auditor  Experience  Chief Information Security Officer (CISO) Panda Global Enterprises, Munich (10 years)  Developed and implemented information security strategies and policies. Conducted risk assessments, security audits, and penetration tests.  Advised clients on GDPR compliance and data protection best practices.
